A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A fun exercise for sure\, but riddled with more plot holes and inconsistencies than this paragraph can possibly convey. It masks itself as a transformative\, thought-provoking movie which questions and pulls at the roots of the series...but\, it's nothing but a fleshy stick which waves itself in cadence to the music of money at the expense of dignity\, or good filmmaking.
